Html:
Hi Guys,
i must install oracle java 7.25 (32bit) and 7.25 (64bit) on windows 7 64bit. Both programs have a msi setup, but the product code is always 26a24ae4-039d-4ca4-87b4-2f86417025ff.

How can i setup the packages in wpp that the operating system can differentiate which package is installed.

Regards,
Daniel

but the product code is always 26a24ae4-039d-4ca4-87b4-2f86417025ff
In fact, no.
The MSI Product Code for 32bit is :
26a24ae4-039d-4ca4-87b4-2f8 32 17025ff

And for 64bit it is :
26a24ae4-039d-4ca4-87b4-2f8 64 17025ff
Hmpf... my fault. I imported the last night the same msi file for 32 and 64bit.
